reports.title: SANCTITY

synopsis.value: Set over the course of a single day, Sanctity follows Sastry, a reserved ITI repair student burdened by the weight of his sister‚Äôs urgent chemotherapy. The only person supporting their struggling family is Kumar Sir, a beloved teacher Sastry trusts like a father. But when Sastry accidentally discovers a disturbing truth hidden within the college‚Äôs CCTV system, his world collapses in a moment. Torn between loyalty and justice, gratitude and guilt, he is forced into a moral crossroads no student should ever face. As the day unfolds, Sastry must decide whether to protect the man who helped save his family or stand up for the dignity of a girl who suffered silently. His choice will redefine the meaning of right and wrong.

reports.title: Legacy

synopsis.value: While on a hunting trip in the isolated wilderness, a father and his adopted teenage son are turned into the prey of unknown assailants. They are unexpectedly joined in their fight for survival by a stranger who reveals the disturbing truth about the son's biological father, an international crime lord, and why that crime lord has sent trained assassins to kill the teenager.

reports.title: Reppa

sources.name: internal
sources.value: Reppa is a drama, romance, and fantasy film that follows the story of a young man, played by Suhas, who navigates love, relationships, and the supernatural. Alongside Harshitha, he embarks on a journey that explores the complexities of human emotions and the mysteries of the unknown. As the story unfolds, the lines between reality and fantasy blur, leading to a poignant and thought-provoking conclusion.
